metadata.title: CVE-2020-8164 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in rails <5.2.4.3, rails < 6.0.3.1 which can allow an attacker to supply informationcan be inadvertently leaked fromStrong Parameters.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
